ingredients.ingredient: 4 large lemons, cut into 8 wedges each

cookingTips: Use organic lemons when possible as you'll eat the entire fruit
Pack jar tightly so lemons release their juices and stay submerged
They require 3-4 weeks of fermentation before use
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through the preservation process, explaining how salt draws out moisture and creates a brine that transforms the lemons into a versatile ingredient.
